entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
